name: Two Or More
description:
Thru moonshine filled nights, near the sacred Alter, Lost souls roam till eternity. Only you and your magic can guide them to their final peace. Catch them and send them away in pairs of Two or better yet in a Holy Threesome, before the time runs out.

 

 

Developed By: Alok Narula

 

Thanks to following awesome art assets I was able to get things up an running to finish the game in 48 hours. We truly stand on the shoulder of Giants.

  • Lost Crypt - 2D Sample Project by Unity Technologies https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/tutorial-projects/lost-crypt-2d-sample-project-158673
  • 2D Art Pack by Manufactura K4 https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/2d-art-pack-14900
  • Animated Bubble Sprite by Wonkee https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/water/animated-bubble-sprite-45733
  • Hand-Painted Low Poly Guns Pack by Andreas Dronov https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/guns/hand-painted-low-poly-guns-pack-26292
